itunes:title: how to build confidence in yourself, relationships, & the gym with Makayla Anisa
title: how to build confidence in yourself, relationships, & the gym with Makayla Anisa
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
itunes:summary:
Fill your shaker cup with some maple syrup because Makayla Anisa is here to fill your soul to the brim with some fun & g(eh)ns. In this week's episode, Britt & Makayla get real with chit chat about breakups, inner work, taking time for yourself, dating, gym confidence, self-talk, weight, photoshop & so much more.
